data.name: Arcade Waifu
data.detailed_description:
Move the puzzle pieces to unlock a new girl. Use hints and unlock bonus levels for maximum gaming experience.

Features

  • Charming girls;
  • Retro styling;
  • Relaxing gameplay;
  • Pleasant music.
data.about_the_game:
Move the puzzle pieces to unlock a new girl. Use hints and unlock bonus levels for maximum gaming experience.

Features

  • Charming girls;
  • Retro styling;
  • Relaxing gameplay;
  • Pleasant music.
data.short_description: A relaxing puzzle game with girls who love games.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 (or equivalent) 64 bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with 1 GB VRAM compatible with DirectX
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
